traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.description: The xorn can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The xorn makes one Bite attack and three Claw attacks.

actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw

bonus_actions.name: Charge
bonus_actions.description: The xorn moves up to its Speed or Burrow Speed straight toward an enemy it can sense.
